attributes.action: Stop Banks and Mortgage Companies repossessing homes when people are struck down by illness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The banks/credit companies should be forced to carry insurance to cover themselves and not place the onus on the customer.If you are hit by stroke/ heart disease etc the last thing you need is more worry on top of what you are going through.
Their own insurance schemes are far too expensive to take out for the ordinary person.
